snippet: Officials at a major Democratic “super PAC” scheduled meetings with potential donors and made plans to coordinate with independent fund-raising groups that support Congressional candidates.
abstract: Leading Democrats commence a furious drive to galvanize and expand the network of wealthy liberal donors that has been largely dormant since 2004, hoping to recruit them to Democratic-leaning super PACs that President Obama believes will be critical to winning re-election in November.
lead_paragraph: Officials at a major Democratic “super PAC” scheduled meetings with potential donors and made plans to coordinate with independent fund-raising groups that support Congressional candidates.

headline.seo: Democrats Heed Obama’s Go-Ahead on ‘Super PACs’
headline.main: Unleashed, Democrats Hunt for ‘Super PAC’ Donors
headline.print_headline: Unleashed, Democrats Hunt for ‘Super PAC’ Donors

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
